name: F.A.N.G
title: The Toxic Alchemist
subtitle: A sinister chemist who uses poisons and potions to control the battlefield
lore: A mysterious alchemist whose mastery of toxic substances makes him a formidable opponent. F.A.N.G's expertise in brewing potions and manipulating poisons allows him to support his allies while debilitating his enemies, making him a dangerous presence on any battlefield.

passive.name: Toxic Mark
passive.description: FANG's attacks and spells mark enemies for [4.5s]. If allies autoattack the marked enemy, they heal [4% of the damage they deal + 0.5% of FANG's Max HP] back to themselves.

Q.name: Brewing Potion
Q.description: Places a health potion to a selected ally nearby or self. By using the potion it restores [205/300/390/505/665] health over [6s].

W.name: Poisoned Tube
W.description: Throws a tube to the target location which breaks at endpoint or if it hits an enemy. Targets hit are poisoned taking [100/185/255/400/480 + 60%AP] as magic damage in [3s] and also they are slowed by [25%] for [3s].

E.name: Push-back
E.description: FANG pushes the enemy behind in a targeted direction.

R.name: Shattered Glass Path
R.description: Creates a broken glass field for [4s]. When an enemy moves in this field, they are damaged by [80/150/210 + 50%AP] whenever they move (triggers every 0.5s). Enemies inside the field can't use dashes and jumps.

1.name: Toxic Concoction
1.description: Potion now grants an additional [15%] of the target's missing health as a shield for 2 seconds when used.

1.name: Venomous Aura
1.description: FANG's E ability decreases enemy healing by [15%] for the duration.

1.name: Corrosive Brew
1.description: Poisoned Tube now also reduces magic shield by [50%].

5.name: Rapid Recovery
5.description: Brewing Potion's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, and the healing amount is increased by [10%].

5.name: Lingering Toxins
5.description: Enemies take [10%] additional damage from all sources during the poison duration.

5.name: Shove and Smash
5.description: Push-back now stuns enemies for 1 second if they collide with terrain after being pushed.

10.name: Glass Shards
10.description: Enemies that move within Shattered Glass Path now also receive a stacking [5%] damage taken increase from all sources, up to a maximum of [25%].

15.name: Alchemical Expertise
15.description: Brewing Potion now grants an additional [15%] movement speed to the target for the duration of the healing effect.

15.name: Toxic Cloud
15.description: Poisoned Tube now leaves a lingering poison cloud at the impact area for 3 seconds, dealing [25%] of the original poison damage per second to enemies who remain within it.

15.name: Forceful Push
15.description: Push-back now knocks back enemies 25% further.

20.name: Venom Master
20.description: F.A.N.G's passive now heals for [7%] of the damage dealt to marked enemies.

20.name: Unstable Mixture
20.description: Brewing Potion now instantly heals for [50%] of its total healing amount, with the remaining [50%] applied over 3 seconds. Also Brewing Potion now has 2 charges.

20.name: Deadly Fumes
20.description: Poisoned Tube's poison damage is now true damage, and enemies poisoned by the tube are revealed for its duration.

20.name: Shattered Nightmare
20.description: Shattered Glass Path now silences enemies while they are standing inside the field.
